name: part_000
file: tmp_【#冥ハロ2025】白上フブキ生誕３DLIVE「冥界Halloween Night!」【白上フブキ⧸ホロライブ】 [7Tm7dVsTPBk]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_000.mov

scenes.description: Opening movie featuring various Hololive members and a medley of songs, concluding with credits and introductory text for the 'FBKINGDOM STORY'.
A 3D performance in a dark, atmospheric forest setting featuring a small mascot-like version of Fubuki.

subtitles.original: 始まりはきっと
subtitles.english: It all surely began with

subtitles.original: 一つの願い
subtitles.english: a single wish.

subtitles.original: それを抱いて私は
subtitles.english: Holding onto that,

subtitles.original: 生まれた
subtitles.english: I was born.

subtitles.original: 孤独な夜空
subtitles.english: In the lonely night sky,

subtitles.original: 震える指で
subtitles.english: with trembling fingers,

subtitles.original: 点と点を繋げよう
subtitles.english: let's connect the dots.

subtitles.original: 1次元では寂しすぎるから
subtitles.english: Because one dimension is just too lonely,

subtitles.original: 私たちは広がりを求めた
subtitles.english: we sought out breadth.

subtitles.original: 点は線となり
subtitles.english: Dots became lines,

subtitles.original: 線は立体となり
subtitles.english: lines became solids,

subtitles.original: そこに距離が生まれた
subtitles.english: and distance was born.

subtitles.original: けれど
subtitles.english: But,

subtitles.original: 3次元ではちょっと遠すぎるから
subtitles.english: because three dimensions are a bit too far,

subtitles.original: 私たちは平面に求めた
subtitles.english: we looked to the surface.

subtitles.original: 点は線となり
subtitles.english: Dots became lines,

subtitles.original: 線は星座となり
subtitles.english: lines became constellations,

subtitles.original: この夜空を繋ぐよ
subtitles.english: connecting this night sky.

subtitles.original: 自分らしくいられる場所を
subtitles.english: A place where I can be myself,

subtitles.original: 気づけばずっと探していた
subtitles.english: I realized I'd been searching for it all along.

subtitles.original: 煌めく星よ その理に集え
subtitles.english: O sparkling stars, gather in that order,

subtitles.original: この旗を目印に
subtitles.english: with this flag as your guide.

subtitles.original: あの日君がいつもそこにいたから
subtitles.english: Because you were always there that day,

subtitles.original: 嬉しくて 続けられたんだ
subtitles.english: I was so happy, I could keep going.

subtitles.original: 今日まで
subtitles.english: Until today.

subtitles.original: 忘れないでね 僕らの星座は
subtitles.english: Don't forget, our constellation

subtitles.original: 君がいたから生まれた
subtitles.english: was born because you were here.

subtitles.original: たとえ君がいつの時を生きても
subtitles.english: No matter what era you live in,

subtitles.original: 何かを好きになる気持ち
subtitles.english: the feeling of coming to love something...

subtitles.original: 大切に歌い続けてね 僕らの星座は
subtitles.english: Please keep singing it with care. Our constellation

subtitles.original: 君がいるから生まれた
subtitles.english: was born because you are here.

subtitles.original: 夜空に輝き 明日へと繋がる
subtitles.english: Shining in the night sky, connecting to tomorrow.

subtitles.original: 未来を目指すよ
subtitles.english: I'll aim for the future.

subtitles.original: 共に行こう
subtitles.english: Let's go together.

subtitles.original: これは僕らのキセキ、
subtitles.english: This is our miracle,

subtitles.original: 僕とキミと、大切なあの子の
subtitles.english: mine, yours, and that precious girl's,

subtitles.original: この王国で過ごす、かけがえのない日々を綴る
subtitles.english: chronicling the irreplaceable days spent in this kingdom.

subtitles.original: 僕たちの物語。
subtitles.english: Our story.

subtitles.original: 小説「FBKINGDOM STORY」ED主題歌抜粋
subtitles.english: Novel 'FBKINGDOM STORY' ED Theme Song Excerpt

subtitles.original: 僕の居る意味はどこにあるの？
subtitles.english: Where is the meaning for me being here?

subtitles.original: 誰かに必要とされたかった
subtitles.english: I wanted to be needed by someone.

subtitles.original: 夢や希望も捨てきれないけど
subtitles.english: I can't quite throw away my dreams and hopes,

subtitles.original: なんとなく今を生きている
subtitles.english: but somehow, I'm living in the now.

subtitles.original: あぁ どれだけ叫んでも
subtitles.english: Ah, no matter how much I scream,

subtitles.original: この声は君には届かない
subtitles.english: this voice won't reach you.

subtitles.original: 金木犀の匂いがした
subtitles.english: There was the scent of fragrant olives.

subtitles.original: 明日のことも忘れたくなった
subtitles.english: It made me want to forget about tomorrow.

subtitles.original: いっそ逃げてしまおうかな
subtitles.english: Maybe I should just run away instead.

subtitles.original: 僕は悲劇の主人公だ
subtitles.english: I'm the protagonist of a tragedy.

subtitles.original: やさしいヒトで居たいな
subtitles.english: I want to be a kind person.

subtitles.original: でもそんな思いも偽善だ
subtitles.english: But even that thought is hypocrisy.

subtitles.original: 誰も幸せにできないの
subtitles.english: I can't make anyone happy.

subtitles.original: 都合良いね、涙が出るの
subtitles.english: How convenient, tears are falling.
